data.title: Sagas of Conan: Conan the Swordsman/Conan the Liberator/Conan and the Spirder God, by L. Sprague De Camp
data.meta_description: Imagine a world of gods and demons, where men are warriors, women are beautiful, life is a fantastic adventure, and the fate of kingdoms balances on the bloody blade of a fabulous hero: Conan of the iron thews, the blue-eyed barbarian giant who towers above the savage Hyborian world. For the very first time in trade, this is the work that relaunched Conan in both the 1970s and 80s, back in print after more than a decade. Come live the adventure again in: Conan the Swordsman (L. Sprague de Camp, Lin Carter & Björn Nyberg)Conan the Liberator (L. Sprague de Camp & Lin Carter)Conan & the Spider God (L. Sprague de Camp)
data.text:
Imagine a world of gods and demons, where men are warriors, women are beautiful, life is a fantastic adventure, and the fate of kingdoms balances on the bloody blade of a fabulous hero: Conan of the iron thews, the blue-eyed barbarian giant who towers above the savage Hyborian world.

For the very first time in trade, this is the work that relaunched Conan in both the 1970s and 80s, back in print after more than a decade. Come live the adventure again in:

Conan the Swordsman (L. Sprague de Camp, Lin Carter & Björn Nyberg)

Conan the Liberator (L. Sprague de Camp & Lin Carter)

Conan & the Spider God (L. Sprague de Camp)
